name: The Sun, the Sky, and I
name_original: The Sun, the Sky, and I
description:
This game was made for the Games For Change Student Challenge 2021.  The theme I chose was "Resilience." 

I hope you enjoy, and any feedback is appreciated.

Press and hold the left mouse button to pull the two orbs closer and build speed. Let go to let them drift apart. Don't let them crash into each other, and avoid obstacles to get the highest score.

Update 4/21/21 @ 11:09 CST: NOTE - the game may not run well on all computers due to visual effects.
